titleStmt.title: Die Veneris, 16. Maii. 1645. By the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament at Westminster. Instructions rules and directions, to be observed & put in execution by Collonel Martin Pinder, Harcourt Leighton, Thomas Harbert, and Captaine Iohn Potter, Esquries [sic], and commissioners of Parliament in the Army, established by both Houses of Parliament, under the command of Sir Thomas Fairfax, knight, commander in cheife: and all other persons whom these instructions &c· doe or may concerne..
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.
